job_details.degree_required: BS in computer science or engineering degree or a related field or equivalent work experience

jd: From: Suraj Prashar, Pivotal Technologies suraj.prashar@pivotal-technologies.com Reply to: suraj.prashar@pivotal-technologies.com Hi, Hope you are doing great!!Please find the requirement below, If you find yourself comfortable with the requirement please reply back with your updated resume andI will get back to you or I would really appreciate if you can give me a call back at my contact number (703) 570-8775 * (Ext. 232). Job Title: Database DeveloperLocation: Weehawken, NJ (Onsite) Local OnlyDuration: 6+ MonthsInterview: VideoVisa Type: USC Only Job DescriptionBS in computer science or engineering degree or a related field or equivalent work experience required.Experience in Requirement Analysis, Strategic Analysis, Software Development Fundamentals, Design, Development, Maintenance, Testing and Implementation of efficient data flow and batch processes in applications.Experience in TSQL programming, Perl or Python and Shell scripting.Good understanding of relation transactional databases like Sybase and MSSQL is a MUST;.Strong knowledge of Extraction Transformation and Loading (ETL) processes using TSQL with Java/Perl scripting.Experience in TSQL code development, performance tuning, query optimization and batch or ETL creation experience.
